rss.channel:
黑客新闻：头版https://news.ycombinator.com/黑客新闻 RSS https://hnrss.org/人力资源服务 v2.1.1 2023 年 11 月 3 日星期五 06:04:56 +0000 TIL: man {gittutorial,giteveryday,gitglossary,gitworkflows}

今天发现了一套关于git的精彩且略显隐藏的手册：

 man gittutorial man giteveryday man gitglossary man gitworkflow
实际上，如果细心的用户刚刚开始研究 git，它们并没有那么隐藏：

 $ man git GIT(1) ... DESCRIPTION Git is a fast, scalable, distributed revision control system with an unusually rich command set that provides both high-level operations and full access to internals. See gittutorial(7) to get started, then see giteveryday(7) for a useful minimum set of commands. The Git User's Manual[1] has a more in-depth introduction. ... SEE ALSO gittutorial(7), gittutorial-2(7), giteveryday(7), gitcvs-migration(7), gitglossary(7), gitcore-tutorial(7), gitcli(7), The Git User's Manual[1], gitworkflows(7) ...

评论网址： https ://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38124845

积分：10
